website_summaries.verdict: This complete green screen studio kit is a fantastic addition to any photo or video studio. All packs down into a portable kit bag for on-the-go use.
pros: An affordable full kit, which includes an easy-to-operate portable background support stand, a 10-by-12 foot muslin material green screen that is more than enough to get the shot you need
Two 16-by-24-foot softbox lights and a 16-by-16 ft. softbox light on an adjustable boom stand
cons: Users report the screen can sag on the stand, so it's worth investing in some clamps

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in working order and WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Of course the green cloth is folded up with creases - but we hung it up on the poles and stand included and turned on the camera and enabled the green screen option and Viola - it worked fine! Yes we will press out the creases - but it seems they really don't matter. All of the lights arrived unbroken and nicely packed - they all work. The cloth is nice with no dust or residue. I'd give this full thumbs up. Haven't marked durability as we just got this!
customer_reviews.author: Lucid S.

customer_reviews.title: greenscreen kit that includes everything needed for good results.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this kit to be anything but adequate but it surprised me. Instructions were not that clear but i figured it all out. one item was a small black pouch included but with no instructions of what it was. Figured it out when the boom arm light almost fell over. Black pouch is a counter weight bag and made the less then robust stand work as needed. Had to steam out the wrinkles from the green screen but first test shot with my Sony a6500 was amazing. After effects key light worked first time with hairs and everything matted with no fringe. Pretty cool having something work out the first time trying.
customer_reviews.author: DarianDodson

customer_reviews.title: half this arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pissed off right now. because this thing is a nightmare to setup. some minor changes to the design would have made a major difference. As it is assembling the lightboxes is like trying to put together a tension puzzle. one of my light bulbs arrived shattered...so that was fun to clean up. then I get the fixture assembled and half of the fixture doesn't work. tested with bulbs that worked in other sockets. nothing. find someone else to by a green screen kit from, this has been nothing but a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: You'll need to make some adjustments - very time consuming.
customer_reviews.text: The sparse instructions (a single page) did not conform to the physical products provided within the kit. I've had to modify/improvise and invent methods of assembly in order to make the product function at all. (major problem with instructions pertaining to mounting of the light shrouds to the supporting rods on two of the light fixtures). Can't recommend this product, until, and if, the instructions are made to conform to the physical product.
customer_reviews.author: Chainsaw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: This kit is just okay for a starter kit. I bought this kit because of the softbox lighting. The instructions are absolutely HORRENDOUS. It took me close to 30 minutes even to figure them out. On top of that, those lights are extremely difficult to set up. I never use those lights because of this reason. I do, however, use the third light, which is very easy to "pop out" and go. The green screen is made of lightweight muslin, so it's pretty thin. Don't expect any quality there. But once the lights are on it, it seems to be okay.
customer_reviews.author: miheu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The lights were a pain to put together. I had to find a Youtube tutorial to be able to get them hooked up. Even then they were really difficult. One of the stands for the hair-light doesn't extend all the way. The green screen is difficult to get wrinkles out of. The light bulbs are sufficient but heat up too much.
customer_reviews.author: Anneh

customer_reviews.title: seems like it will break if you fart too close to ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY flimsy set up..seems like it will break if you fart too close to it..smh...i wish i had read the reviews prior to buying it..i would def have spent an extra 50-80 and got one of the name brand ones like neewer or something
customer_reviews.author: Vaite_Po_Caralho

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Green Screen & Soft Lights ANYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews after I ordered and before the package came. No broken lights. It's not nearly as cheap as others make it sound. It's a ridiculously affordable kit that more than delivers it's worth. It is not nearly as hard to put together as others have made it out to be. I did watch a YouTube video while it was shipping so I had an idea of what to do as the instructions included are truly horrible. Highly recommended to anyone getting into video production
customer_reviews.author: Rob Kafka

customer_reviews.title: Good system, pretty many features, well packaged
customer_reviews.text: You'll definitely need to steam the material to get the wrinkles out, and you'll need some extra clamps to pull the material taught. After that, it works pretty well, and I liked the larger size for most of our applications.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Not good for a lot of set ups and break downs because the fittings and stands are not going to hold up. The soft boxes are fiddly. Lots of work to get them set up. Next lights will be an LED unit that does not require the soft box. That being said. Everything worked out of the box and it performed its job. Lights look good at the camera end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every bulb works and it's easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream come true for me. I've dreamed of having the capability to do semi-professional movies and video clips. Every bulb works and it's easy to put up and take down. Carrying case is great. Iron or steam clean the massive green screen and shoot away! My home "studio" is helping me professionally and academically. This 2000 watt set up allows me to key out perfectly indoors.
customer_reviews.author: John Charles McGaughey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overal.
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the product. The lighting kit and green screen are great. It's perfect for personal use at home or a small studio. The carry bag is also convenient. Nothing was damaged. The only problem I had, like everyone else, was the manual instructions. They are pretty awful. I had to watch some video tutorials on YouTube to get it set up.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is a great kit. It's easy to set up and store away. I think the frame could be built a little more sturdy, as the top post has a fair amount of flex in it when putting on the cloth. I wish the lights came with LED bulbs for more brightness, but other than that this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Helpful affordable kit
customer_reviews.text: This is not the highest quality or most professional kit ever made, but it is super helpful for someone who wants to get some starter gear on a budget. The lights are pretty decent, and the green screen is effective. Protip: iron the green screen sheet and make sure to weigh it down tight to remove shadows on the backdrop
customer_reviews.author: the_hangman

customer_reviews.title: the hairlight stand is super flimsy though
customer_reviews.text: i mean for what i paid, it does the trick ok. the hairlight stand is super flimsy though. really all the stands are pretty disappointing. and I mostly hate how the middle rod sags in the middle
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was very anxious to get my new kit. However, when it did arrive, I was very disappointed. It was well packed however almost every box contained signs of some sort of water damage and other damages. This was very of putting.
customer_reviews.author: Widlu Dieujuste

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. This should be everyone's initial investment if they are considering a career in something like YouTube
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! Just have far more green screen than I needed lol but it allows me to do some special project shots I wouldn't of been able to do had it been smaller. Overall though, easy instructions - difficult to perform lol I hear setting up the lights gets easier (man, that was hard the first time!) as you practice so we'll see, but I've Chroma keyed the shizz outta all kinds a things with the perfect amount of lighting that it also comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: It is a good set for the money. The only thing I could not figure out was the green screen frame. The bars would not fit together for full extention
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice to have instructions on how to assemble the boom-stand ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I've been looking for and fits my needs perfectly. Would have been nice to have instructions on how to assemble the boom-stand and screen stand better, but I do love this kit. It would have been even better if they supplied LED bulbs instead of the squiggly florescent bulbs thou. Great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: It is really big
customer_reviews.text: THe Green Screen is really big but you can take a few of the links out and make it smaller. It's nice to have the option to go wider and smaller. I havn't used the green screen for filming yet but I did notice getting the wrinkles out on such a large green sheet will be challenging, so ended up ordering in addition to this one the portable and folding screen.....that one has some wrinkles too but did shoot with it and it seems to work nicely. As expected, one of the bulbs didn't work but otherwise the lights seem to work fine.....
customer_reviews.author: Victor.....

customer_reviews.title: rest of the kit is great!! To everyone saying the stands don't slide ...
customer_reviews.text: I received one of the covers for the lights in the wrong size. Will edit if replaced. Small mistake, rest of the kit is great!! To everyone saying the stands don't slide out right: It's tricky. Use an Allen wrench and loosen all 4 screws where the poles connect, remove the poles completely and slide back in the right way. Sounds confusing but I don't know how better to describe the process. YouTube tutorials exist as I found out after! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Austin T.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of problems!!!! I hated this so much! I got so stressed out about the whole thing and finally decided to give up!! The first problem I noticed was that there was little instructions on how to put it together! I didn’t understand a THING! It is not a bright green as shown in the picture but more of a very dark green! I would never buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Renee L. Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Low-Priced But High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed by the quality of this chromakey for the price. I’m a meteorologist who’s done work in front of green screens for more than 20 years. This kit allows me to do videos at home with excellent results. I’ve ordered on Amazon since day 1 but I believe this is my first review. I’m really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: Warning: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the time spent having to return this piece of junk back. I knew I wasn't expecting top quality by purchasing this studio kit, however I also wasn't expecting the the light stands to not hold the weight of the diffuser. It feels cheap because it is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: HikingGirl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely need better instructions on how to put everything together
customer_reviews.text: The most frustrating part was the assembly. Definitely need better instructions on how to put everything together. Had to watch a couple of online videos in order to figure it out. However, once it's all put together it works as advertised. For the price it is really really hard to beat. I would definitely recommend it to any novice or anyone who's working on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: This was very nice it was easy to put up and take down. The green screen is a bit thin but works. The lights give me a natural look. I have used this for my latest video productions and like the look. The poles seem to be well built. I have not had it too long but so far I am loving it
customer_reviews.author: Ray Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to set up, great fit and easy to pack up and move!
customer_reviews.author: JrFTW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set up!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. Very reasonable price. Nice, professional looking. Study. Bright lights.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for any beginning filmmaker or photographer
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat this set. It's perfect for any beginning filmmaker or photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Heilman

customer_reviews.title: Everything good but big bulb received broken.I haven't received any response so far
customer_reviews.text: Everything ok but 105W bulb recieved broken , can I return the bulb only as rest whole package every thing is ok
customer_reviews.author: Vinaykumar Ashar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value, especially for the price. Everything was included in the package, all bulbs worked, lighting is great, easy-ish to set up. I would buy this all over again. The green-screen in my opinion is just a "bonus" here.
customer_reviews.author: KJVL

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Working with them now. Large light inner ring broke after 2nd indoor use by an adult. Messaged seller today and will update if resolved.
customer_reviews.author: David  Gisick

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for green screen projects.
customer_reviews.text: Self contained all in one kit. Complete set as described. Great package for amateur green screen projects. Excellent for home / garage studio. Likely not intended for a lot of mobile travel work
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Cuccia

customer_reviews.title: Quick, simple, and inexpensive green screen kit!
customer_reviews.text: The set worked really well. I used it for a convention with some friends. It was easy to setup, take down, and packed well. For a quick, simple, and inexpensive use of a green screen, this kit works great!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good package
customer_reviews.text: Very nice complete package, would buy this again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Meows3

customer_reviews.title: One light does not work
customer_reviews.text: Ok kit for the cost...not built the best. One light socket does not work and I will just repair it myself instead of the trouble to return. I did not notify where it was bought from.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen frame is quite sturdy. I like the bag this setup comes in. Good quality. I give four stars because for me it was a little scary putting together the soft boxes... I felt like I was going to break them with to much tension, but they work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. VERY GOOD customer service. Everything came as advertised but my 105W CFL bulb was broken in shipping Fancierstudio shipped replacement bulb right away! Thanks for a good product, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: PastorBKnoxville

customer_reviews.title: Lights are great. Backdrop is a wrinkled pain in the butt ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great. Backdrop is a wrinkled pain in the butt though.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R.

customer_reviews.title: Value set
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a little thin, but overall it's hard to beat for this kind of $.
customer_reviews.author: CARTER YAGER

customer_reviews.title: Everything perfect! Super handy
customer_reviews.text: Everything perfect! Super handy, no cracks, bends, tares, stains or brakes. It's a balancing act, but once it's setup, just enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Magrin Tannus

customer_reviews.title: It took me better than 2
customer_reviews.text: The only I give this 4 stars is the lack of instructions. It took me better than 2.5 hours to assemble. Other then that I like it. Next time I will be able to assemble it in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for the budget
customer_reviews.text: The build quality isn’t very good, but it’s acceptable given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ps Z

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what is included
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. I am a little concerned about the plastic brackets that make up the two part joint for the hair light. Also the directions for assembly of the hair light stand were vague; and by that I mean we didn't get any.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkytastic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Green screen a little thin. Easy enough to clamp a cheap tarp on the back side to keep ambient light from coming thru. A little lacking on instructions to set up boom. Again... pretty decent..
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and price
customer_reviews.text: One bulb dis come broken. But everything was wall packaged. Love the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Real Logic

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of lights and green screen!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap metal screws
customer_reviews.text: I just received this kit we took put it together and the thread snapped really cheap disappointed didn’t even get to use it yet was trying to set it up and the stand snap and hit my new 55 inch screen tv
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good set for the money, nothing fancy, but does a great job
customer_reviews.author: John D. Spann

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product extensively and it of good quality and I have not had a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product extensively and it of good quality and I have not had a problem with any of it. From the bag to the lighting fixtures I am happy with Fancierstudio products.
customer_reviews.author: Kai  Mann

customer_reviews.title: ... give 4 stars instead of 5 due to the terrible instructions manual
customer_reviews.text: I only give 4 stars instead of 5 due to the terrible instructions manual. It took me 2 weeks to assemble as I am usually super busy at work and you just have to figure out by yourself how to build everything.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery Everything's works great Easy to set up Great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These stands are well made for what you spend. They are by no means as weak as some ppl say when they say they will blow over if slightly touched. I was happy with the build quality. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Gieck

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: - a little better instructions on set up would have been helpful. Other than that .. nice product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Completely Broken...???
customer_reviews.text: missing soft light diffuser, broken 105W bulb, damaged frame holder, not even a boom arm. Don't get this one waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product no joke!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing when i first set it up, it was the best feeling ever my set up is going to be A1 thanks for the fast delivery n great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for any everyday blogger, vlogger, or video and photo type person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty hard to put all together. I still haven’t figure it out how to put boom soft light together. Seems like something is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. I do some HD video for Facebook ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. I do some HD video for Facebook and Youtube and they are turning out great with this setup. I couldn't be happier. I had no broken bulbs, or anything else defective.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied. We will have to see how long it ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money for sure, but you get what you pay for. Tripods are thin, but that was expected for the price. Hair light bulb was broken in mine too, just as was mentioned in other reviews, and I have not found a local source to replace it yet. However, I am satisfied. We will have to see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Davis

customer_reviews.title: bien pero mal
customer_reviews.text: A pesar que venden exactamente lo que me muestran la realidad es que dicho kit pesa 35 libras y no 11 como dice en la descripcion. A pesar de que reclame no me hicieron caso. Despite selling me exactly what reality show is that this kit weighs 35 pounds and 11 as stated in the description. Despite claiming they did not listen.
customer_reviews.author: Víctor Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Product quality and condition was great. Unfortunately the product came with a black background ...
customer_reviews.text: Product quality and condition was great. Unfortunately the product came with a black background and not green as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, arrived as advertised, higher quality than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M Seitz

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice but I only wish the metal legs had rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice but I only wish the metal legs had rubber feet on them. However, I think one can buy the rubber feet at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Rector Praetorius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! Received mine yesterday, it took about 30-45min to put it together. All of the lights work, nothing was missing or broken. Green screen did come wrinkled but what do you expect? It was folded lol that happens with everything. I didn't iron it and my editor still works fabulously. Over all I give it a 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Fanstastic Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are especially useful! We take them out for our field shoots.
customer_reviews.author: AttorneyTKR

customer_reviews.title: Not shipped as described
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage.... what can you expect for the price? Product is not as shown in the picture. You were advised. The only reason I don’t send it back is cause I pitched the stupid box. 🤷🏻‍♂️😒❌👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Angel Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was a very good buy! well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great setup! The green screen is tough and BIG
customer_reviews.text: Great setup! The green screen is tough and BIG! The soft lighting is strong enough for some really nice lighting for green screen work and cinematography. Very nice kit!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Curl

customer_reviews.title: What an Awsome Setup
customer_reviews.text: Everyone was Jealous when they came over to see my new setup Now everyone uses my stuff
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great video kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, very good even light that the color is daylight balanced. Would recommend. Only issue is I had was a few bulbs that the plastic base opened up from the screw base. Krazy glue fixed it, but still a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kiar Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment! But it is a little hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great equipment! But it is a little hard to put together because of lack of instructions. Everything is very high quality and I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the large bulb broken. Stands are fairly unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived wonderfully wrapped. Everything works great and would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived wonderfully wrapped. Everything works great and would recommend it. I gave it a four because it does not come with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great setup for the price. Used for a short music video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: Was tasked with setting up a tv studio for my school. For the money this was a good choice and does the job. I can't speak to a professional setup, but it looks pretty good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty damn good. obviously for the price, some of the stands are a bit flimsy but they hold up. It's probably worth buying some extra weights for legs too. Definitely worth the price if this is all you can afford.
customer_reviews.author: K. Diez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design -curtain rings twon't allow the fabric to spread firmly across the rod, instead sag in the middle- HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy; the green et al cloths come with O rings that slip over the rods that have clips that attach to the fabric. Of course there is no way for these to stay in place spread out across the bar so the fabric bunches in the middle with major sagging ripples. Even if there were clamps the fabric is not wide enough where the clamps would reach it from the frame. Terrible design. There were no directions with recommendations on how to set up the lights for best effects. I returned it for a ki that had fabric that slipped over the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton's Place

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT AF
customer_reviews.text: Dope, it's all good. It all works, and it's all great.
customer_reviews.author: Sakon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for the price. One light bulb broken w/o any package damage.
customer_reviews.author: jdhoefle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, not spectacular. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Henrique Jose P. Serra

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a pretty good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people are are saying this is flimsy. I think it's a pretty good product for the price. Nothing was broken. And it all works as expected. I'm very happy with this purchase. My set came with basic instructions. It only told how to do a couple of things. But I didn't have any trouble putting the set together. I won't be breaking it down and moving it--it's staying set up in my home. So I am happy with how long it took to set up. If I was moving it around a lot, I might not enjoy it quite as much as the soft boxes were a little hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs better instructions, but this rig will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Complete package at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a turn key complete package of everything I need! I was able to open it, set up and and get to work shooting. It's all that I needed at an amazing price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Only a minor issue with one of the lamps but that was quickly resolved
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter kit. Bars are not strong enough to do chin-ups on but work great for what they need to do
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Graham

customer_reviews.title: Item came fast and in perfect shape. It's made with some cheap part but ...
customer_reviews.text: Item came fast and in perfect shape. It's made with some cheap part but I expected that with its low price. Still these lights and green screen work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what we need it for
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what we need it for. It was a bit difficult to set up but once we got the hang of it everything went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Stand for overhead light is really not strong enough. ...
customer_reviews.text: Stand for overhead light is really not strong enough. You will need some sort of weight (I bought 20lb ankle weights) or it will fall over. I have the weight on the feet of the stand and the stand is bending... will have to change my location. Green cloth works okay, but being it's cloth it's wrinkled and HUGE to try to iron. Overall I bought it for the lights and they work. Have had many compliments on the videos I've shot with them.
customer_reviews.author: tiny*dancer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I am photographer and I have this set up at home for my home studio and it is fantastic! I would highly recommend for anyone looking for the extra lighting to bring their photos alive!
customer_reviews.author: Stevenie Cavin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but the first use is really complicated
customer_reviews.author: Manset

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I absolutely love it and would buy from them again. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hasley

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions + thin green screen = this product
customer_reviews.text: Mainly 3 stars because ive spent 4 hours now trying to put it together. Nothing is labeled part wise, and there is 1 sheet that says what to do with a tiny visual. Would give 4, except they forgot instructions on how to put together the hairlight... super annoyed and honestly would have paid more for better instructions. Green screen itself is too light. I turned on my lights and it became see through for the webcam. You'll need to get two of these or do what i did and just double back.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson S.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good product, very good price, but tripods are not very stable
customer_reviews.author: ulises

customer_reviews.title: the stands are not sturdy, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product served the purpose of a cheap studio setup. the backdrop is thin, the stands are not sturdy, you get what you pay for. It served it purpose, but is not a great setup that will get years of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Themazzonis

customer_reviews.title: Handy and simple...
customer_reviews.text: my whole photography life has changed dramatically... i am adding that life to my photography, i am also using it for filming...
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This green screen was amazing, I love everything about it. For this price, you can't get better. BUT there is one thing, the instructions that came with this seemed like for another set, so you have to look at the picture and guess a little. I use after effects and gee, it looks pretty good for 180 bucks. I LOVE IT! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: but for my kid making some projects for school this was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Stands are a bit flimsy... but for my kid making some projects for school this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Another Opinionated Guy

customer_reviews.title: One of the stands bends
customer_reviews.text: Overall it all seems to be good quality and packaged well, but one thing we did notice is that one of the stands even with the weight option added for stability it still bends much as it was holding a much heavier bulb and so much stable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M Rodriguez de Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived w MAJOR broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I needed this this week, but it arrived with the main light and another light busted to pieces...I am returning for a full refund...complet waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joiner

product_meta.title: Fancierstudio 2000 Watt Lighting Kit with 10'x12' Chromakey Green Screen and Three Softbox Lights (One with Boom Arm Hairlight Softbox) for Studio Photography and Video Lighting (F9004SB 10x12G)
product_meta.description: You are buying a brand new fancierstudio 2000 watt photo studio video softbox lighting kit with Backdrop Stand and Muslin Backdrop. What's included is one backgroupd support stand able to extend up to 8.5' and 10' wide. The muslin backdrop included is 10' x 12' good enough for any studio shoot. Ultra compact design making this kit the best choice. The Video Photography compact studio kit that gives you over 2000 watts output This kit comes TWO 16"x24" softbox onf forfill light, one for key light and ONE 16"x16" easy softbox for your hairlight. You could use two 4 light heads as your main light and the 105W as your fill light or hair light. Light output is adjustable with 4 light outputs. You could use them in the studio photography or videography as well as on location projects. This lighting kit is the most affordable kit on the market today. IT is compatible with any camera on the market today like Nikon, Canon, Sony, Olympus and more.
feature_bullets: Fancierstudio 2000 Watt 10’x12’ Green Screen Softbox Lighting Kit Background Stand Included

The Green Screen Lighting Kit includes Two 16"X24"Softbox One 16"x24" Softbox For Hair light, 3 x Lightstand 6.5ft tall (One Boom Arm with Sandbag) sand not included, 2 x Light head able to hold 4 bulbs each One Light Head For Hair light Fit Single Bulb, 8 x 45watt photo video fluorescent bulbs And One 105 watt Bulb For Hair light, One 8ft high 10ft wide background stand one 10’x12’ green screen. The kit also comes with carrying case.
These CFL light bulbs rated for 120v for USA standard. Please make sure before buying if your country uses 220v please do not use these bulbs they will pop or blow.

Green screen videos can look amazing and can help any video that you produce stand out from the crowd. Videos are everywhere these days and the last thing you want to do is to spend a long time creating a very ordinary video which achieves nothing. Once you create your own green screen studio you have so much more flexibility to create great looking videos and really achieve the results that you are looking for.

Benefits to a soft box is that it produces light which is more even than light coming from an umbrella. A softbox emulates the soft, directional lighting usually produced by natural window light. It softens and diffuses the lighting from the attached light source by transmitting the light through a diffusion panel.
